### Description
We currently have a script that will spin up 4 unique instances of Artemis locally and run.  We use this script for demos, testing and development.  Currently, the script is hardcoded to 4 nodes and hardcoded to a specific config.toml file for each node.  I would like this to be more generic so that the user can specify the number of nodes and the script can copy and modify the default config.toml file so that it works.

### Acceptance Criteria
* rename demo.sh to run.sh
* allow run.sh to accept a CLI param to specify the number of nodes to spin up locally
* modify existing logic in the script to setup the run env to work with N nodes
* modify the tmux screen to display N nodes
* diff config/config.toml with:  
  * config/demoConfig.0.toml
  * config/demoConfig.1.toml
  * config/demoConfig.2.toml
  * config/demoConfig.3.toml

  and ensure that the script can copy and modify the config.toml with the necessary changes needed for each node that the script spins up.
